title: Principles of Cooperation
ziele:
Cooperative systems support both, human and digital agents in the main cooperative activities of communication, coordination and collaboration. 
In this course, the basic enabling technologies (including HW, SW, and communication technologies) will be presented with focus on how to use those technologies in cooperative system development.
lehrinhalte: In the lab, selected principles of cooperation will be implemented in practical programming exercises.
methoden: tutorials on implementation technologies, programming examples
equivalent: INMIPUECOOP: UE Cooperative Systems (1,5 ECTS) or INBVEUETEKO: UE Telekooperation (1,5 ECTS)
